vulnerabilities.theDescription: Authorisation data sent over an insecure channel
File Access Race Condition: The time between checking a file property and a file operation is long enough to be exploitable.
Failure to enable validation when parsing XML gives an attacker the opportunity to supply malicious input.

assets.theSignificance: Unanonymised and in the wrong hands, this data can be very damaging.
theEnvironmentProperties: Researchers very worried about the disclosure of partially anonymised patient data.
Availability of NeuroGrid is quite important, but prepared to sacrifice this if doing so safeguards clinical data.
NeuroGrid availability important for clinical trials
Important for CA to know who is allowed to access what data items.
